# Installation

- [ ] Install instructions for R and RStudio https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/
- [ ] Start up RStudio
- [ ] Install the package from CRAN `install.packages("novelqualcodes")`
- [ ] Walkthrough of the package (example code)

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Install it from CRAN
install.packages("novelqualcodes")

# Or install the live development version from Github.
# Want to know what this version has compared to CRAN? See 'NEWS.md' above.
remotes::install_github("DesiQuintans/novelqualcodes")
```
